name: TOTP Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 TOTP Tool 节点。主要用于: Generate a time-based one-time password

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Generate a time-based one-time password | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: generateSecret

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: algorithm (值: None) - HMAC hashing algorithm. Defaults to SHA1.
digits (值: None) - Number of digits in the generated TOTP code. Defaults to 6 digits.
period (值: None) - How many seconds the generated TOTP code is valid for. Defaults to 30 seconds.
